title: Jhin sound bug
body: When Firefighter Tristana and High Noon Jhin are in the same game and the High Noon Jhin recall goes off and when he shoots his gun during the channel the gun shots are sound effects from the Firefighter Tristana skin.

replies.body: Thanks for the report, we're looking into it! With that name, you must be a Jhin main. ;D

Yes I am! :) Thank you for replying, there has been another Jhin bug that is in every game I play now and is very game impacting. I don't know how this happens, but; the High Noon Jhin w passive mark stays on targets for the whole game and never goes away and the readability of when a target is marked or not is extremely bad. I am not sure if this is just limited to the High Noon skin.

So far I believe this is purely limited to the High Noon skin, just played a fairly long game and no instances of the bug appeared. This bug occurs over the course of a game and I don't know the cause but it makes using the skin a handicap and I adore the skin, since it's the only Jhin skin.{{sticker:slayer-jinx-unamused}}
So, i can't see to reproduce this bug any more...I do not know how it happened for those two-three games. I'll keep trying!
I seem to recall some patch notes about fixing this, actually?

Nope, i just got it working in a game that I'm literally playing rn. I'll upload screen shots soon
http://postimg.org/image/tk9b3jlj5/ 
http://postimg.org/image/l1de9epj5/
OH, I didnt actually read the whole comment chain. I meant I remember reading patch notes about the sound FX thing, the passive mark thing is news to me.
Yeah, and the sound effect thing was fixed for JUST Karma, no other champion

http://postimg.org/image/tk9b3jlj5/
http://postimg.org/image/l1de9epj5/
(Is there a better way of doing this?)
